medications.sig_text: Take 1 tablet by mouth daily at bedtime
medications.clinician_notes: For Alzheimer's cognitive support. Monitor for nausea or vivid dreams.

medications.sig_text: Take 1 tablet by mouth twice daily
medications.clinician_notes: Added for moderate Alzheimer's. Works with Donepezil.

medications.sig_text: Take 1 tablet by mouth twice daily with meals
medications.interaction_notes: Take with food to reduce stomach upset. Hold 48 hours before and after any CT scan with contrast dye.

medications.sig_text: Take 1 tablet by mouth daily with breakfast
medications.clinician_notes: Added because Metformin alone was not controlling blood sugar.
medications.interaction_notes: Can cause low blood sugar. Keep glucose tablets or juice nearby. Do not skip meals.

medications.sig_text: Take 1 tablet by mouth daily in the morning
medications.interaction_notes: May cause ankle swelling. Rise slowly from sitting to avoid dizziness.

medications.clinician_notes: Added for blood pressure and kidney protection with diabetes.
medications.interaction_notes: Can raise potassium levels. Avoid potassium-rich salt substitutes.

medications.sig_text: Take 1 tablet by mouth daily at bedtime
medications.clinician_notes: For cholesterol control. Check liver function yearly.
medications.interaction_notes: Avoid grapefruit juice. Report any unexplained muscle pain.

medications.sig_text: Take 1 tablet by mouth daily on empty stomach
medications.clinician_notes: For iron deficiency anemia. Recheck hemoglobin in 3 months.
medications.interaction_notes: Take on empty stomach with orange juice for better absorption. Separate from calcium, antacids, and Metformin by at least 2 hours. May cause constipation or dark stools — this is normal.

medications.sig_text: Take 1 tablet by mouth daily with food
Take 1 capsule by mouth daily 30 minutes before breakfast
medications.clinician_notes: To protect stomach from Aspirin and iron supplement.
medications.interaction_notes: Separate from iron supplement by at least 2 hours — reduces iron absorption.
